summary: One advantage to not knowing when Cyberpunk 2077 is being released means that I have plenty of time to learn how to record...
body:
One advantage to not knowing when Cyberpunk 2077 is being released means that I have plenty of time to learn how to record gameplay and then that into gifs.

You can count on ya boi to gif almost anything and everything in that damn game when it’s finally in my grasp.

reblog.comment:
One advantage to not knowing when Cyberpunk 2077 is being released means that I have plenty of time to learn how to record gameplay and then that into gifs.

You can count on ya boi to gif almost anything and everything in that damn game when it’s finally in my grasp.

One advantage to not knowing when Cyberpunk 2077 is being released means that I have plenty of time to learn how to record gameplay and then that into gifs.

You can count on ya boi to gif almost anything and everything in that damn game when it’s finally in my grasp.

You can count on ya boi to gif almost anything and everything in that damn game when it’s finally in my grasp.

summary: Разработчики Cyberpunk 2077: У консолей текущего поколения ещё достаточно мощности
title: Разработчики Cyberpunk 2077: У консолей текущего поколения ещё достаточно мощности
body: Представители портала GamingBolt поинтересовались у дизайнера уровней Майлса Тоста из CD Projekt RED, не ограничивают ли команду технические характеристики консолей текущего поколения при проработке масштабного ролевого проекта Cyberpunk 2077, на что… Читать дальше »

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 - Werden Playstation 4 und Xbox One mit dem Spiel fertig?
title: Cyberpunk 2077 - Werden Playstation 4 und Xbox One mit dem Spiel fertig?
body:
Cyberpunk 2077 – Werden Playstation 4 und Xbox One mit dem Spiel fertig?

Die veröffentlichte Gameplay-Demo zum kommende Ego-Shooter “Cyberpunk 2077” konnte durchaus optisch beeindrucken, was die Frage aufwarf, ob die Hardware-Leistung der aktuellen Konsolen Playstation 4 und Xbox One überhaupt ausreichen werde. Diese Frage beantwortet Level-Designer Miles Tost.

Level-Designer Miles Tost betonte bei den Kollegen von Gamingbolt, dass die Current-Gen-Hardware – in Form…

View On WordPress

summary: This is really good, if true. Padding is basically unnecessary filler missions that add nothing to the story, like fetch...
body:
This is really good, if true. Padding is basically unnecessary filler missions that add nothing to the story, like fetch quests.

Source: https://www.playstationlifestyle.net/2018/10/12/cyberpunk-2077-playtime-cd-projekt/#/slide/1

summary: Any thoughts on what's been released about Cyberpunk 2077 so far?

summary: “Cyberpunk 2077 Gameplay Reveal — 48-minute walkthrough” A gorgeous game, but this is a shooter no matter how many ways you...
caption:
“Cyberpunk 2077 Gameplay Reveal — 48-minute walkthrough”

A gorgeous game, but this is a shooter no matter how many ways you slice it. I’d love to play a game in this world without using guns. Not as a pacifist, but as a schemer.

reblog.comment:

A gorgeous game, but this is a shooter no matter how many ways you slice it. I’d love to play a game in this world without using guns. Not as a pacifist, but as a schemer.

summary: Fuckin’ tricked out, state-of-the-art, this thing. Don’t even got no standard port. Bells ‘n’ whistles, though - dynamic camo...
caption: Fuckin’ tricked out, state-of-the-art, this thing. Don’t even got no standard port. Bells ‘n’ whistles, though - dynamic camo armor and motor impulses rivalling that of the human nervous system. Its actuators’re actually pimped with titanium fiber. ‘N’ it can go anywhere - literally.

reblog.comment: Fuckin’ tricked out, state-of-the-art, this thing. Don’t even got no standard port. Bells ‘n’ whistles, though - dynamic camo armor and motor impulses rivalling that of the human nervous system. Its actuators’re actually pimped with titanium fiber. ‘N’ it can go anywhere - literally.

Its actuators’re actually pimped with titanium fiber. ‘N’ it can go anywhere - literally.
